name: Java-api-to-mtgdb
tagline: A Java API to access the web services provided by mtgdb.info.
body:
### Welcome.
This is the homepage for the Java API to the [mtgdb.info](https://www.mtgdb.info) database.  The goal of this project is to provide a clean, Java approach to accessing the great features available at mtgdb.info. 

### Javadoc
If you'd like to check out what the Java API offers without actually checking out the code, the Javadoc is available here:

[mtgdb Java API Javadoc](http://alotau.github.io/Java-API-to-mtgdb/doc/)

### Authors and Contributors
This project was created by Joseph Rios (@alotau) after seeing the great work already started by Fredrick Seitz (@fritzcoder) on the mtgdb project.  The [C# API](https://github.com/planeswalkers/CSharpMtgDb.Info) that was already in existence.

### Support or Contact
You can let me know about issues on the [github page for this project](https://github.com/alotau/Java-API-to-mtgdb).  If you want to contact me directly email me at "joey -a- littlepancake.com".
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
